channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lithium Battery Fire Traps Drivers in Sweltering Heat on California Highway
item.description: Traffic was at a standstill for hours on a portion of I-15 near Baker, Calif., after a truck carrying lithium batteries overturned and caught fire.

item.title: Olympics Medals: Latest Results for the Paris Olympics by Country
item.description: The latest medal count and results for the Paris Olympics.

item.title: Janet Yellen says lowering carbon emissions is the ‘single greatest economic opportunity’ of the century
item.description: Fighting climate change requires a global investment of $3 trillion annually through 2050, Yellen said.

item.title: ‘Maybe I’ve Gotten Worse’: Trump Makes Clear That Unity Is Over
item.description: At a rally in Minnesota on Saturday, former President Donald J. Trump once more escalated his attacks against Vice President Kamala Harris, painting her as extreme and mocking her demeanor.

item.title: Simone Biles Is Done Being Judged
item.description: Three years after she dropped out of the Tokyo Games with a mental block, she is back at the Olympics with a defiant attitude — and a sense of where she is in the air.

item.title: It’s been exactly a year since the Fed’s last rate hike, and these parts of the economy are finally feeling the squeeze
item.description: “Things have softened in the last couple months, and Fed officials are going to be pretty concerned if they start softening more rapidly.”

item.title: Trump, Appealing to Bitcoin Fans, Vows U.S. Will Be ‘Crypto Capital of the Planet’
item.description: Donald Trump, speaking at a Bitcoin conference, told cryptocurrency holders that he would end the “persecution” of their industry.

item.title: Israel Hits Lebanon in Overnight Strikes After Soccer Field Attack
item.description: The overnight strikes, a response to a rocket attack from Lebanon that killed 12 people in an Israeli-controlled town, stopped short of a major escalation, for now.

item.title: It’s not 8 glasses a day anymore. Here’s how much water you should drink each day
item.description: If you’re drinking eight 8-ounce cups of water a day you’re doing well, but you could likely benefit from some adjustments.

item.title: At Least 12 Killed in Rocket Attack From Lebanon in Golan Heights
item.description: It was the deadliest single attack from across Israel’s northern border in months of hostilities. Israel blamed Hezbollah, which denied responsibility.

item.title: At Least 12 Killed in Rocket Attack From Lebanon in Golan Heights
item.description: It was the deadliest single attack from across Israel’s northern border in months of hostilities. Israel blamed Hezbollah, which denied responsibility.

item.title: The top-performing movie theater for ‘Twisters’ survived a massive tornado in 2013
item.description: “The people who live in Tornado Alley have a certain defiance towards mother nature.”

item.title: Firefighters Race to Contain Wildfires in California and Oregon
item.description: The fire in Northern California has burned more than 350,000 acres. In Oregon, firefighters were working to contain the Durkee fire, which has covered at least 288,000 acres.

item.title: What to Know About Suni Lee’s New Uneven Bars Move
item.description: Sunisa Lee has been practicing a new difficult element in her uneven bars routine. If she completes it at the Olympics, it will be named “The Lee.”

item.title: Kamala Harris has these 3 men on her short list of potential running mates
item.description: Harris is expected to make a selection by Aug. 7, in order to align with the party’s plan to virtually nominate a ticket by that date.
